node.address: km 2 via baru, 203 , Baru Island, Colombia

content.value:
Our lovely countryside hostel is surrounded by nature and fruit tropical trees, it is the perfect location for you to relax, enjoy nature and get acquainted with local culture. We have a beautiful outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop where you can sip de sun light

We are located 40 mins away from cartagena, and 15 away from playa blanca where we have the free us of sun beds and lockers arranged for you.

In our hostel we offer spacious and comfortable shared rooms, they are full of natural light, decorated with local materials and crafts.

We extremely advice you to contact us before your arrival, ir order to advice you on the best way to get to us.

description.description:
Because Cartagena has much more to offer, we bring you URANTIA!
Located in Bar√∫ island, 40 mins away from Cartagena and 10 mins away from Playa Blanca, you will find our beautiful countryside house. Surrounded by nature and tropical fruit trees, is the perfect place for you to relax, enjoy nature and local culture.
Watch the stars from our rooftop terrace, enjoy the sun on our swimming pool, read a book or watch a movie on our tv room or take one of our champeta lessons, Urantia has everything to make your stay and unforgettable one.
